Sorry You have a redeem request pending,please wait while we process your request. Rewards Barikoi needs permission to Access Your Location
Leaderboard Last 7 days Last 30 days To date Level 1 Level 5 Level 4 Level 3 Level 2 Click on the Own Places icon at the bottom of Home Screen and then click \'Add a New Place\' Position the marker by dragging in the map where you want to make your mark, then click \'SELECT PLACE\' Check the list if the Place is already on the list, otherwise click \'Not in the list, Skip\' On the next page fill out the form about the details of your address Click Submit to finish and get a code!
Click on the place to open in place view in the place view, click on the button with an image of Three Dots, then select \'Update Place\' Just like adding a place, a map will appear ,drag the map to set the changed location and click \'SELECT PLACE\' then change the address inputs where needed and click Submit, done! Click on the place to open in place view in the place view, click on the button with an image of Three Dots, a popup menu will appear, then Select \'Delete Place\' Confirm deletion by clicking \'Ok\' Adding a Place Updating a Place Deleting a Place Capture photo from camera Select photo from gallery Select Action Need 4 letters in 1st part Need only alphabets in 1st part Need 4 numbers in 2nd part Sorry,this code is already taken. Try again maybe? " is avilable, are you sure you want this code?" done with your place update!
